title: Build Gym Member Portal with trainer/client dashboards, AI assistant VORTEX, and full admin controls

requirements.text: Create a backend data model for workout plans that includes exercise name, sets, reps, weight, rest time, and notes. Workout plans must be associated with specific clients and created by specific trainers.

quotes: trainers can update workout plans

acceptanceCriteria: Workout plan data structure stores all exercise details
Each workout plan is linked to a client ID and trainer ID
Support for multiple exercises per workout plan

requirements.text: Implement backend functions for trainers to create, update, and delete workout plans for their assigned clients.

quotes: trainers can update workout plans

acceptanceCriteria: Trainers can create new workout plans with multiple exercises
Trainers can update existing workout plans
Trainers can delete workout plans
Only trainers can modify workout plans for their clients

requirements.text: Create a backend data model for client progress tracking that records completed workouts, weight lifted, sets completed, date, and personal notes.

quotes: clients can see their progress in real-time

acceptanceCriteria: Progress entries are linked to specific clients and workout plans
Track completion date and actual performance metrics
Support progress history over time

requirements.text: Implement backend functions for clients to log workout completions and update their progress metrics.

quotes: clients can see their progress in real-time

acceptanceCriteria: Clients can mark workouts as completed
Clients can record actual sets, reps, and weight used
Clients can add personal notes to progress entries

requirements.text: Create a user management system with three roles: admin, trainer, and client. Store user profiles with role, name, email, and assigned relationships (trainers to clients).

quotes: ALL THE FUNCTION should be in the hands of the app creater
publish this app official available for others

acceptanceCriteria: Support admin, trainer, and client user roles
Store user profile information
Track trainer-to-client assignments
Admin can manage all users

requirements.text: Implement backend functions for admin to add, edit, and remove users (trainers and clients), and to assign clients to trainers.

quotes: ALL THE FUNCTION should be in the hands of the app creater
each minor control in my hands only

acceptanceCriteria: Admin can create new trainer and client accounts
Admin can edit user information
Admin can deactivate or remove users
Admin can assign and reassign clients to trainers

requirements.text: Create a backend storage system for app branding settings including logo URL, primary color, secondary color, and accent color. Include functions for admin to update these settings.

quotes: logo colour and change
each minor control in my hands only

acceptanceCriteria: Store customizable branding settings
Admin can update logo and color scheme
Settings persist across sessions
All users see updated branding in real-time

requirements.text: Implement an AI assistant named VORTEX with backend functions to handle user queries about workouts, exercises, fitness advice, and progress insights.

quotes: intelligent ai VORTEX

acceptanceCriteria: VORTEX can answer fitness-related questions
VORTEX can provide workout recommendations
VORTEX can analyze user progress data

quotes: clients can see their progress in real-time

acceptanceCriteria: Clients see their current workout plans
Form to log workout completions with sets, reps, and weight

quotes: intelligent ai VORTEX

acceptanceCriteria: Chat interface with conversation history
Message input with send functionality
VORTEX responses appear in real-time

requirements.text: Apply the customizable branding (logo and colors) throughout the entire application UI so all users see the admin-configured theme.

quotes: logo colour and change
each minor control in my hands only

acceptanceCriteria: Logo displays in navigation or header
Primary, secondary, and accent colors applied to UI elements
Branding updates reflect immediately across all pages
Consistent theme throughout trainer, client, and admin interfaces

requirements.text: Implement role-based access control so admins can access all features, trainers can only manage their assigned clients' workouts, and clients can only view and update their own progress.

quotes: ALL THE FUNCTION should be in the hands of the app creater
each minor control in my hands only

acceptanceCriteria: Admin has full access to all features
Trainers can only see and modify their assigned clients
Clients can only access their own workout plans and progress
Unauthorized actions are blocked on both frontend and backend

requirements.text: Design a professional fitness-focused visual theme with energetic colors (avoiding blue and purple unless customized), modern typography, and clean layouts that work well for gym and fitness contexts. The theme should feel motivating and athletic while maintaining clarity and usability across trainer, client, and admin interfaces.
acceptanceCriteria: Cohesive visual design across all pages
Color scheme appropriate for fitness/gym context
Typography that is clear and professional
Layout supports both data-heavy displays and simple interactions

constraints: The admin (app creator) must have exclusive control over branding, user management, and all app settings
Trainers can only access and modify workout plans for their assigned clients
Clients can only view their own workout plans and progress data
All branding changes (logo and colors) must update in real-time for all users
nonGoals: Integration with external fitness tracking devices or APIs
Nutrition tracking or meal planning features

required: Athletic fitness-themed logo icon suitable for a gym member portal (gym-logo.dim_256x256.png)
Hero banner image with energetic fitness theme for landing page (hero-fitness.dim_1200x400.png)
